name: Party Mashup
description:
What is Party Mashup you ask?


Party Mashup is an action filled party game that is sure to spread joy!

Party it up with up to 4 friends in split screen multiplayer!

Enjoy a total of 10 party games (With many more on the way!)

Party Mashup is developed by people who love to party, for those who want to have a good laugh with their friends and family!

Competitive Mode:

In this chaotic Game Mode, compete to become all powerful Mini-Game champion!

First to meet the score goal wins glory and fame for themselves and (maybe) their family! (assuming you don't want to beat the ever living daylights out of them)

Hangout Mode:

Ok, so maybe you don't want to beat the crap out of your friends and family, and that OK!
Play the mini-game of your choosing and beat the crap out of your friends in this relaxing mode.

Still in development:

Party Mashup is still in development and has been for a couple of years.

We value your feedback as well as suggestions. If you have any ideas on how WE can make YOUR gameplay experience more enjoyable, please let us know!

In free play, you can play whichever Mini-Game you choose without the constant threat of your honor and life on the line! (If you’re a certain fire-prince, this should be especially helpful!)

Freeplay is a more casual game-mode that allows for more flexibility play style.
